channel.title: What should i make next?
channel.description: Okay im thinking about making a minigame work, Im thinking castlewars , Chompy Hunting, Duel arena, or Tzhaar fight arena (not pits). Now whitch one should i chose to make next?

item.title: What should i make next?
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:23, topic:101898”][quote author=getsome link=topic=146091.msg1392964#msg1392964 date=1180417538]

[quote author=hippyss link=topic=146091.msg1392947#msg1392947 date=1180417358]

[quote author=getsome link=topic=146091.msg1392942#msg1392942 date=1180417319]

[quote author=hippyss link=topic=146091.msg1392932#msg1392932 date=1180417188]

[quote author=getsome link=topic=146091.msg1392924#msg1392924 date=1180417097]

Duel Arena, I haven’t seen a lot of those.
[/quote]you dont see allot if you only use oldskool pimpscape and testscape shit,

cheezscape 80 project blitz 16 both have duel arena and hippy i also mented that message that u should make chompy bh
[/quote] Yeah chompy hunting is gonna be a challange for me
But i’ve always wanted to see it
[/quote]its also the hardest one beside duel arena since castlewars are just a bunch of object cases whit a flag and a waiting room and the fight pist is just a wildy whit safe zone
[/quote]Fightpits is simple i’ve made already it’s Just 2 voids lol.
[/quote]codes dont exist from voids you know there are methods and checkers i mean its more then 2

1-making wildy in the arena
2-making the player check
3-winner check
4-red skull in area
5-monster span after 30 minutes
6-waiting room counter
7-viewing orbs
8-cases of doors
9-npc guard yelling name of winner

Like he said, his version, not Runescape’s version ;)[/quote]ooh sorry that isnt runescape,s version :> it,s my completed version

Read full topic
